summary: The Emotiva BasX A2 Stereo Amplifier is priced at $320, making it an affordable option in the audio equipment market.

It delivers a powerful output of 160 watts RMS per channel over the standard audio frequency range of 20 Hz to 20 kHz, with a low total harmonic distortion (THD) of less than 0.1%, ensuring clean sound.
The amplifier supports a broad frequency response of 10 Hz to 80 kHz and offers a high signal-to-noise ratio of over 112 dB, providing high-quality audio reproduction.
It has a minimum recommended load impedance of 4 Ohms and features a damping factor greater than 500, indicating strong control over connected speakers.
The input sensitivity is rated at 1.2 V for maximum power output, and it incorporates a gain of 29 dB, compatible with various audio sources.

attributes.power output (two channels driven): 160 watts RMS per channel; 20 Hz – 20 kHz; THD < 0.1%; into 8 Ohms
attributes.power output (1 khz): 250 watts RMS per channel; THD < 1%; into 4 Ohms
attributes.minimum recommended load impedance: 4 Ohms (equals one 4 Ohm load or two paralleled 8 Ohm loads)
